mapper.select: select distinct t.workstation_id, t2.workshop_id, t2.station_no, t2.name, t2.location, t2.content, t2.remark, t3.name as workshopName from bu_repair_task_workstation t left join bu_repair_plan_task t1 on t1.id = t.task_id left join bu_mtr_workstation t2 on t2.id = t.workstation_id left join bu_mtr_workshop t3 on t3.id = t2.workshop_id where t1.plan_id = #{planId} order by decode(trim(translate(t2.station_no, '0123456789', ' ')), null, to_number(t2.station_no))

select t.*, t2.workshop_id, t2.station_no, t2.name, t2.location, t2.content, t2.remark, t3.name as workshopName from bu_repair_task_workstation t left join bu_repair_plan_task t1 on t1.id = t.task_id left join bu_mtr_workstation t2 on t2.id = t.workstation_id left join bu_mtr_workshop t3 on t3.id = t2.workshop_id where t1.plan_id = #{planId} order by decode(trim(translate(t2.station_no, '0123456789', ' ')), null, to_number(t2.station_no))
select t.* from bu_repair_task_workstation t left join bu_repair_plan_task t1 on t1.id = t.task_id where t1.plan_id = #{planId}

select t.*, t2.workshop_id, t2.station_no, t2.name, t2.location, t2.content, t2.remark, t3.name as workshopName from bu_repair_task_workstation t left join bu_repair_plan_task t1 on t1.id = t.task_id left join bu_mtr_workstation t2 on t2.id = t.workstation_id left join bu_mtr_workshop t3 on t3.id = t2.workshop_id where t.task_id = #{taskId} order by decode(trim(translate(t2.station_no, '0123456789', ' ')), null, to_number(t2.station_no))
